name: Introduction to Film Studies
description: This course introduces students to the fundamentals of film studies, including the history of film, the various elements of film, and the techniques used to analyze films.

name: Sound Design Basics
description: This course covers the basics of sound design, including the principles of sound, the basic processes of sound design, and the use of sound in film.

name: Sound Editing
description: This course covers the principles of sound editing for film, including the editing of dialogue, sound effects, and music.

name: Advanced Sound Design
description: This course covers the advanced principles of sound design, including the use of synthesizers, sound synthesis, and sound processing.
